document.full_text: a chinese man was arrested on tuesday for creating a fake u.s. army unit and selling immigrants on the idea that joining the squad was a path to citizenship, authorities said.
document.title: chinese man arrested for creating fake army unit in scam
lines_and_colors: a chinese man was arrested on tuesday for creating a fake u.s. army unit and selling immigrants on the idea that joining the squad was a path to citizenship, authorities said.
